title: The Mahavishnu Orchestra - The Inner Mounting Flame 1971
description:
The Mahavishnu OrchestraÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s The Inner Mounting Flame (1971) was the first album which totally captured the power of hard rock and the freewheeling improvisational aspects of jazz.

The sound is loud, raw, and dangerous. Melodies and rhythms like had never been heard before. The distortion and the loudness could be insulting, and the speed of the playing was mind-numbing.
 
One of the greatest jazz-fusion recordings ever made.



The Mahavishnu Orchestra
 with John McLaughlin

 The Inner Mounting Flame

 1971

 

 CD / 1998 / Remastered / 320Kbps



 Tracklist:

 1. Meeting Of The Spirits 

 2. Dawn

 3. Noonward Race

 4. A Lotus On Irish Streams 

 5. Vital Transformation

 6. The Dance Of Maya

 7. You Know, You Know

 8. Awakening 



The Mahavishnu Orchestra:

 John McLaughlin / guitar

 Jerry Goodman / violin

 Jan Hammer / piano, electric piano and organ

 Rick Laird / bass

 Billy Cobham / drums



The Mahavishnu Orchestra / The Inner Mounting Flame / 1971
